info.description: Allows you to perform create, read, update and delete (CRUD) operations on existing tables
info.title: ServiceNow

parameters.description: Return field display values (true), actual values (false), or both (all) (default: false)
parameters.name: sysparm_display_value

parameters.description: The maximum number of results returned per page (default: 10,000)
parameters.name: sysparm_limit

parameters.description: Do not execute a select count(*) on table (default: false)

parameters.description: An encoded query string used to filter the results
